buting especially requested information.
When the survey procedures were completed, the data compiled and
tabulated, a significant response that included all levels and areas of
educational effort was available. It was the first step toward an answer,
though an answer in minimums, to education’s question, "What is the po¬
tential need for spectrum space?”
